requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8/10
  • Processor: Pentium III or Athlon Equivalent required
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1+ compatable 32 MB Direct Sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8/10
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card (Direct X 8 compatible)
